text: Nagra tamagruna nofira ome hagerafi emeri hagerafi huneramante'na, tame'a zaferinarera eri rukamre neramante'na, tamavufgareti tamazeri ano vazineramantena, nasimura huhu huvaziramantane'na tamasimura erita ete kasefa huta manigahze. E'ina hanugeta Nagrikura Ra Anumza mani'ne huta keta antahita hugahaze.
